relation: Great for these types of students
The has been no crimes so far on this campus. Public saftey is always around to make sure everyone is safe.
QCC has over Forty clubs! Each of these clubs are very active.
All students are welcomed. There are so many majors you can choose from and the school is diverse.
You can visit the Holocaust Center, Art Gallery or watch television during your break in the Student Union Building.
Food is good, however it is pricey
The professors are well educated and commited to their students.

-Use all the resources the school provides(tutoring, library, ACC , SUL and more) -Dont be afriad to ask for help, whether its emotionally or academically -GET INVOLVED! dont let your time at QCC past you by -Be serious, education is the key to success

This school is very wonderful, the staff make sure they assist you in any way possible. There are so many clubs and activities you can be involved with. Being at Queensborough gives you a chance to a brighter future.
pageTitle: CUNY Queensborough Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 07/01/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has not been to campus. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 32 Camille from East Elmhurst, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Food and Dining The food is very mediocre here. Nothing out of the ordinary except a Starbucks cafe in the library building. But for the most part, the college is filled with vending machines and various fast food selections in the cafeteria such as cold sandwich wraps, pasta, hamburgers, pizza, fries and etc. Dorm Life There are no dorms on campus. Academic Rigor If you show that you care and want to position yourself better than yesterday, it will be accredited. The academic rigor isn't too out of hand for the devoted, college oriented student. Tips for prospective students Queensborough Community College is an excellent place for the self-propelled student whom within himself or herself finds the passion to pursue perfection and self-expression. There are plenty of teachers there, but I'd recommend to push yourselves to acquaintance yourself with the teacher's who carry the most experience. You'd be surprised to find out how much some professionals there are really dedicated to teaching a major or exemplifying a real working environment in their field of study. In three sentences Queensborough Community College is a rather mellow environment with friendly teachers and staff. The students
